thread.title: BRIEF-Carlisle Cos To Sell Carlisle Foodservice Products

title: BRIEF-Carlisle Cos To Sell Carlisle Foodservice Products

organizations.name: brief-carlisle cos to sell carlisle foodservice products
brief-carlisle cos to sell carlisle foodservice products reuters staf

text:
21 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Carlisle Cos To Sell Carlisle Foodservice Products Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Carlisle Companies Inc: 
* PRESS RELEASE - CARLISLE COMPANIES INCORPORATED TO SELL CARLISLE FOODSERVICE PRODUCTS 
* CARLISLE COMPANIES INCORPORATED TO SELL CARLISLE FOODSERVICE PRODUCTS 
* CARLISLE COMPANIES INC - DEAL FOR ‍ $750 MILLION IN CASH​ 
* CARLISLE COMPANIES INC - ‍ AGREEMENT TO SELL CARLISLE FOODSERVICE PRODUCTS TO JORDAN COMPANY OF NEW YORK, NY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
